Secure Cloud Sync

Securely upload and store evidence in a FIPS compliant cloud storage.

Collaborate

Colleagues can instantly access uploaded evidence.

Photos

Take photos from any device and add them to case files

Audio/Videos

Conduct interviews, record evidence and add to case files.

Developed by law enforcement officers, iCrimeFighter is a mobile evidence management solution bringing true mobility to officers’ everyday work life. iCrimeFighter’s mission is to make evidence collection and investigative collaboration easier and more efficient.

Get Started

The iCrimeFighter mobile application will replace

Digital Camera
Audio Recorder
Video Camera
Notebook
USB Drives
CD/DVDs
Servers
Delivery Folks

Benefits

To Command

  • More efficient workflows with evidence shared with entire agency in one click
  • Documented chain of custody throughout entire process
  • Saves at least 30 minutes of officer time for every case worked

To Field Officers

  • One easy to use app replaces multiple standalone devices (e.g. cameras, microphones, video cams, notepad and body cams)
  • All evidence centrally stored and organized by case
  • Multiple officers can upload evidence simultaneously to the same case

To Technology/ Records

  • Files uploaded and stored with 256 bit encryption in FIPS compliant AWS GovCloud storage
  • Easily share cases within and outside agency
  • All officers using standard process for evidence collection

How It Works

Mobile App

Take and gather photos, audio, video, and notes in the field and securely upload to the cloud.

Online Portal

View all evidence collected in the field through iCrimeFighter’s web portal on a desktop, laptop or tablet.

Department Collaboration

When iCrimeFighter is deployed to a team or agency, case data can be shared among other department users.
